Name: team_must_be_assigned
Description: Ensure every team is assigned to exactly one project

Name: worker_belongs_to_team
Description: Ensure every worker is assigned to a team

Name: sprint_backlog_must_have_sprint
Description: Every Sprint Backlog must be linked to one Sprint

Name: feature_must_have_backlog
Description: Every Feature must be part of the Product Backlog

Name: user_story_must_have_epic
Description: Every User Story must be part of an Epic

Name: task_must_have_story
Description: Every Task must be part of a User Story

Name: scrum_master_supports_team
Description: Ensure every team has a Scrum Master

Name: po_manages_backlog
Description: Ensure the Product Backlog is managed by a Product Owner

Name: sprint_has_one_goal
Description: Each Sprint must have one defined goal
